item.description: I started this meet up group for any local active dog owners who are looking for a fun & safe place for their precious pups to run around and socialize with other friendly dogs. I have restricted this meet up group to dogs 30lbs and under, but all small breeds welcome. Our facility has lots of indoor and outdoor space available year round.
item.how_to_find_us: Ask anyone at the front desk!

group.name: The Greater Boston Active Small Dog Meetup Group

item.name: Active Small Dogs First Meet Up!
